properties.areaDesc: Alleghany, VA; Bedford, VA; Montgomery, VA; City of Roanoke, VA; Roanoke, VA; City of Salem, VA; Rockbridge, VA; Botetourt, VA
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 9:55PM EST until January 11 at 10:30PM EST by NWS Blacksburg VA
properties.description:
At 954 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from near Monterey to near Sedalia, moving northeast at 60
mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

Locations impacted include...
Roanoke...
Salem...
Vinton...
Clifton Forge...
Buchanan...
Troutville...
and Stewartsville.

This includes The following Locations The Salem Fairgrounds and
Roanoke Regional Airport.
properties.instruction:
Prepare immediately for DAMAGING WINDS. For your safety, move to an
interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Stay away
from windows.

Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to
flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

When it is safe to do so, please send your reports of hail of any
size, as well as reports of any wind damage, including downed trees
or large limbs, to the National Weather Service by calling toll free
at 1...8 6 6...2 1 5...4 3 2 4. Reports and pictures can also be
shared on the National Weather Service Blacksburg Facebook page and
on Twitter.

NWSheadline: A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM EST FOR NORTHEASTERN ALLEGHANY...CENTRAL ROANOKE AND SOUTHWESTERN ROCKBRIDGE COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL VIRGINIA...NORTHWESTERN BEDFORD COUNTY IN SOUTH CENTRAL VIRGINIA...BOTETOURT COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL VIRGINIA AND EAST CENTRAL MONTGOMERY COUNTIES IN SOUTHWESTERN VIRGINIA...THE CITY OF SALEM AND THE CITY OF ROANOKE
